title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 399.10 - Limitations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 399.10 - Limitations

State Regulations
(a) Administrative
food stamp fraud hearings will be scheduled by the department based upon a
determination by the department of sufficiency as set out in section
399.6
(c) of this

Part. (b) Administrative
disqualification hearings will be scheduled by the department based upon a
determination by the department provided that not more than six years has
elapsed between the month an overissuance occurred and the date which the local
social services district discovered the overissuance and upon a determination
of sufficiency as set out in section
399.7
(d) of this

Part. (c) The department will not
schedule either administrative food stamp fraud hearings or administrative
disqualification hearings where the total amount of the overissuance is less
than $35. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
399.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
